Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Iceman \Ice"man\, n.; pl. {Icemen}. 1. A man who is skilled in traveling upon ice, as among glaciers. [1913 Webster]
2. One who deals in ice; one who retails or delivers ice. [1913 Webster]
iceman n 1: someone who cuts and delivers ice 2: a professional killer [syn: {hatchet man}]
